mapper.update: update file set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, folder = #{folder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, foreign_chain = #{foreignChain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, type, folder, size, foreign_chain, create_time, update_time, user_id from file
